sentences.simplifiedText: 见到他的表现，她感到无比自豪,觉得他就是这样出色的人。
sentences.traditionalText: 見到他的表現，她感到無比自豪,覺得他就是這樣出色的人。
sentences.pinyin: Jiàn dào tā de biǎoxiàn, tā gǎndào wúbǐ zìháo, juédé tā jiùshì zhèyàng chūsè de rén.
sentences.translation: Seeing his performance, she felt extremely proud, thinking he is such a great person.
